Mod.name: Binding of Noita
Mod.description:
A mod that aims to add as many items from Binding of Isaac as possible to Noita. This mod is a work in progress where I will gradually add items.
Currently added: - 3 Dollar Bill - Bob's Rotten Head - Brimstone - Dr. Fetus - Loki's Horns - Number One - Polyphemus - Sacred Heart - Spoon bender - Infestation 2 - Technology - Technology 2 [img]https://media1.giphy.com/media/VfEJYmcgfVPKvU3VL1/giphy.gif[/img] [img]https://media2.giphy.com/media/gKqroC0XfA0deWYc4i/giphy.gif[/img] [img]https://media0.giphy.com/media/Y4tgFJ1Zc4cqPStSD8/giphy.gif[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/z5QmOTt.gif[/img]
